Key Arguments: Truth is subjective and constantly changing, requiring healthy debate.
Government should not have the power to determine truth, as it could lead to tyranny.
The bill aims to silence dissenting opinions against the government's ideas and agendas.
Governments are often sources of misinformation and disinformation themselves.
The bill is seen as unconstitutional and anti-democratic, similar to a US court ruling against government censorship.
Notable Quotes: Nobody should be given the power to determine what is truth, as what is truth is constantly changing and to be able to determine what is the truth, there needs to be healthy debate!
